A pellet of tar mixed with the fur of a nocturnal creature, such as a [bat](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=12), _nightpitch_ used to cast a [_darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) spell makes the area of the _darkness_ difficult terrain.
